attributes.action: enforce manufacturers to only use recyleable materials for packaging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local authorities are proposing to charge householders for the amount of waste they produce, but in a lot of cases we do not get the choice as to whther to recycle or not as manufacturers continue to use packaging that is not able to be recycled. If manufacturers were forced to use packaging that could be recycled, then if a householder chooses not to recycle they should be "fined" by the local authority.
